skin.tone_adjustment: warm honey tan with golden bronze undertones
skin.texture: smooth with natural warmth and sun-kissed quality

facial_structure.face_shape: round to oval with soft natural contours

features.eyes: warm almond eyes with natural brightness and gentle expression

hair.color_tendency: rich black with warm highlights from sun exposure

subject.scope: facial features, skin nuance, and hair texture only - does not affect body, posture, mood, camera, lighting, or outfit
